Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a great location!”
Reviews.Author: kkoep
Reviews.Content: love hotel stayed multiple times hotel clean comfortable staff wonderful helpful located lively street heart city dont noise street balconies look city recommended friends stays loves cant wrong price location

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Old Fashioned Hotel in the Heart of Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Karen Y
Reviews.Content: friends spent days madrid absolutely loved clean beds comfortable nice little balcony bathroom spotless complaint middle pretty noisy night outside dont plan actually getting sleep 2am pretty quiet mornings happened soccer match spain italy spain won imagine days noise followed owners wonderful accommodating despite language barriers highly recommended youre looking clean friendly establishment middle close sol metro station

Reviews.Title: “super location charming local Hostal”
Reviews.Author: gerry r
Reviews.Content: basic fashioned hotel staff friendly english limited adds charm location sample madrid life plaza mayor san miguel market buzzing emma caferestaurant corner favourite spoiled choice value eating

Reviews.Title: “Gem in Madrid!”
Reviews.Author: Kellispec
Reviews.Content: loved little hostal stayed 5 nights definitely spotlessly clean located amazing city riccardo front desk proprietor speak lot english communicated helpful paid 68 euros double weeks ago november highly recommend little cant wrong

Reviews.Title: “excellent value for money. great location to walk anywhere in madrid central.”
Reviews.Author: smokee2
Reviews.Content: 8pm nightlife sounds smells people eating drinking balcony rear quieter loved style lift genuine spanish friendly service clean safe

Reviews.Title: “Just what we wanted”
Reviews.Author: SeafoodQueen
Reviews.Content: previously mentioned hostal excellent location plenty bars restaurants doorstep 510 minutes walk metro walking distance sights madrid spotlessly clean shower overlooked lightwell meant bit dark morning werent bothered street noise booking email efficient friendly stay

Reviews.Title: “perfect location.”
Reviews.Author: bigeck13
Reviews.Content: time visited madrid hostal la trip immediately book return location none beside plaza mayor 2 minutes calle de cava baja tapas bars book directly hotel website payed 69 euros night paying cash 79 euros card didnt money bank staff friendly dont speak english managed bad definately booking return madrid

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Service”
Reviews.Author: joensy191
Reviews.Content: stayed hostels europe south america received worst treatment gotten hostel friend due arrive day told advance confirmed pay charged double fo night telling owner staff overcharged laughed told wrong embarassed front guests completely rude helpful stay recommendations information friend city madrid main chose hostel promised free internet access internet throughout entire stay staff awful ruined otherwise stay madrid

HotelInfo.Name: Hostal la Macarena
HotelInfo.Address: Cava de San Miguel 8, 28005 Madrid, Spain
